title: Sue Abercrombie (09-17-15)
content:
DANIELSVILLE - Lettie Sue Kirk Abercrombie, 67, passed away on Thursday, September 17, 2015, at Athens Regional Medical Center in Athens. 

Mrs. Abercrombie was born on November 15, 1947, the daughter of the late David Hadden Kirk and Letty McCurdy Kirk.  She was a medical assistant, having worked for Dr. Cabniss and Dr. Ashmore. ...
